name: Snatchertale
description:
This was a silly little mashup game thing I made as a secret santa gift for a friend of mine! It was made in around a month so it's far from perfect, though I'm still super happy with how it turned out (and how the person reacted to it!)

Asside from the obvious Undertale assets, the spritework for Snatcher/his attacks as well as the battle theme were all made by me during that month time limit, and i'm really happy with how they all came out!

I figured it's been sat dormant on my desktop long enough now so.... might as well post it somewhere!!

There's no real pacifist route in the game, so you advance the battle by FIGHTing!
